channel.title: Programming on ANF Blogs
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on ANF Blogs

item.title: Introduction into C# and setting everything up
item.description: Introduction Oh, hello there! I think you’re interested in learning C# (pronounced as “See Sharp”). Well, you’re in luck because ANF is planning to make tutorials and write some tips on C#. For those of you who like to interact through video, no this series will most likely never be based on “video”. There shall be nothing but plain text to read. So I hope you like reading! Before we get into this, I want to give you a quick disclaimer that I am no C# professional and I am only really just going to teach you everything that I know.
